directions: In a small bowl combine oil, vinegar, sugar and the seasoning packet from the ramen noodles.  Mix well and refrigerate at least one hour before serving, or overnight.
In a large bowl combine broccoli, carrots, green onions and sunflower seeds.  Crush ramen noodles and stir in.  Pour dressing over salad about 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package chicken flavored ramen noodles, crushed, seasoning packet reserved
title: Broccoli Coleslaw
